                                                                throws org.apache.sling.api.resource.PersistenceException,
                                                                       javax.jcr.RepositoryException
        create chosen component node from the template node referenced by the piece path
        Parameters:
        piecePath - the path of the requested component piece
        templateNode - the pieces template node to use for creation
        componentNode - the new component node parent node
        Returns:
        the created component node
